metadata: (info { (description "This game appears to be a two-row mancala-style board which was found on the steps of a building at the Axumite site of Matara in Eritrea.") (rules "2x8 with a store.") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1275") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/sow/two rows/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in Eritrea, from around 600 to 800.") } ) (graphics { (board Style Mancala) }) (recon { (concept "Sow" True) })
